spec: update the tools service and repo to reflect the fact that the tool should not have a postcode property... that can be gotten whenever needed by joining to the users table.
commitMessage:
Remove postcode from tools table and related code

- Added migration to remove postcode column from tools table
- Updated Tool entity to remove postcode property
- Updated ToolRepository to remove postcode from queries
- Updated ToolsService to remove postcode handling
- Updated e2e tests to remove postcode expectations

The postcode can now be retrieved by joining with the users table when needed.
